title: Chainlink External Adapter for wstETH Price
description: This external adapter will fetch the exchange rate for the amount of stETH per 1 wstETH from the WstETH contract on the Ethereum mainnet.

ETHEREUM_RPC_URL.description: RPC URL of a Mainnet ETH node

RPC_URL.description: A fallback RPC URL of a Mainnet ETH node
